The total count of the chapter.

getLinesWithWord(String) - Method in class BookController
Gets lines containing occurrence of the given word.
getLinesWithWord(String) - Method in interface Controller
Returns the lines of text in which the specified word can be found.
getNextChapter() - Method in class BookController
Returns the next chapter or the current chapter if there is no next chapter/volume.
getNextChapter() - Method in interface Controller
Returns the text in the next chapter.
getPreviousChapter() - Method in class BookController
Returns the previous chapter or the current chapter if there is no previous chapter/volume.
getPreviousChapter() - Method in interface Controller
Returns the text in the previous chapter.
